titles: The Jesuits Gospel according to Saint Ignatius Loiola wherein their impious doctrines against the Christian faith, their pernitious maxims against Christian princes, and their unjust practices destructive to all humane society, contrary to the Sacred Scriptures, the laws of God, and right reason are declared.
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
notes: Sometimes attributed to John Sergeant--cf. NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Item at reel 1239:16 identified as Wing S2573 (number cancelled).
Reproduction of originals in the Harvard University Library and Huntington Library.
